Method Detail

run

public OptInfo run(DepotLinkedList mainDepots)
This module tries to split each truck into much smaller trucks as done in Sharing. But what's different is that, before creating the new smaller trucks, this module will attempt to assign as many shipments as possible from the current truck to other trucks, and will only create new smaller trucks from shipments that could not be reallocated. This method itself does the selection of the truck to be split, and then calls AttemptToRelaxSplitRoute() method to see whether that truck can be split in a feasible and cheaper manner. Author: Dilsara Pathirana

Overrides:
run in class MixedFleetOptimization
Returns:
Boolean value stating whether the module found any improvements
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

AttemptToRelaxSplitRoute

public boolean AttemptToRelaxSplitRoute(Truck originalTruck,
                                        TruckType truckType,
                                        Depot thisDepot)
This method attempts to split the originalTruck into smaller trucktypes specified in trucktype. But prior to splitting it attempts reallocate as many customers as possible to other routes, and only create the new smaller trucks from the customers that could not be reallocated. Author: Dilsara Pathirana

Parameters:
originalTruck - Truck being splitted.
truckType - The truck type of the smaller trucks to be splitted into.
thisDepot - The depot this truck belongs to
Returns:
A boolean value stating whether the relax/split attempt succeeded.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
